Reviews.Title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
Reviews.Author: S. Beaver "Stormthowur"
Reviews.Content: Years of experience in security, alarm / surveillance installation - so take my word for it!  Do not waste your money on this piece of junk!  They were cheap so I got three of them to try.  I was excited that they did send three different sensor / receiver channel combinations.  However the results were: 1 - worked fine but goes thru batteries quickly, 1 - never stopped going off as soon as you turned it on - even with that sensor without a  battery, 1 - never goes off even if you test it inside the house four feet from the receiver.  So if you are just looking for a "doorbell" for your driveway that may or may not work at any given time (or may not work at all) - go for it.  If you are looking for a reliable system to notify you of traffic or movement don't bother.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Patrol
Reviews.Author: Burton R. Floyd
Reviews.Content: This inexpensive wireless Alarm system works better than expected. Mine is in the weather in a birdhouse to keep the rain off.It works with animals, human, or auto.Set one in your mail box and it will tell you when the mail is delivered.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Working Well
Reviews.Author: OrnateCactus
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  Positioned under my deck and facing toward the front door.  Works very well and no false alarms.

Reviews.Title: works great no idea what 1 star guy is talking about.
Reviews.Author: rockalittle
Reviews.Content: This device works great. it is sensitive enough to beep if a leaf crosses it's path as it falls. It works flawlessly. If it had a vibrate function on the receiver I would give it 5 stars.Since the guy who gave it a bad review did provide any supporting comments, I am disregarding his bad score. Maybe he used bad batteries....

Reviews.Title: Just never worked
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: It just never worked!I tried several timesAnd bought new batteries alsoPlease think twice before buying. .

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed.
Reviews.Author: nancy
Reviews.Content: It worked for about two months, but frequently activated in the daytime for no apparent reason.  It has now stopped working completely.  Steer clear of this product.  I should have known better!  Trademark 82-3731 Driveway Patrol Infrared Wireless Home Security Alarm System

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: cuzzzzz
Reviews.Content: I bought this alarm for a friend that has four (previously feral) cats, a mother and kittens, that come on her porch to be fed.  She'd frequently saw them walking away, or saw signs that they had been there, and knew that she'd missed her chance to feed them.  This alarm solved the problem... it detects their prescence immediately, and she goes right out and feeds them.  She considers it one of the best presents she ever got.  She turns the receiver off at her bedtime.One thing.. it can be set off by things blown past it due to the wind (clumps of leaves, etc.)

Reviews.Title: Garage/Driveway Monitor
Reviews.Author: Mark Raymond
Reviews.Content: We have had some kids or whoever coming into garages in our neighborhood recently and removing bicycles and other things right in daylight. With this monitor, we can tell when someone comes into our garage. Works great and delivery was simple and quick from this trusted Amazon merchant.

Reviews.Title: No worky
Reviews.Author: troy thiessen
Reviews.Content: I seriously wouldn't recommend buying one of these. The low price is tempting, but they seem to pick up radio interference from various sources, which, like mine, will cause them to chime every 15 seconds until the battery dies.I have placed mine far from the house, close to the house, and about 8 different places but it still malfunctions. Others will tell you, they do chime constantly.

Reviews.Title: Would not recommend
Reviews.Author: Boris
Reviews.Content: This unit might work inside or in a location where there are no temperature differences between different services but outside especially if there are temperature differences, like a shaded area, and you will get allot of false positives.

Reviews.Title: driveway alarm from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Alvin Misker
Reviews.Content: Product was received promptly and in good shape. It was installed and worked as advertised! It is very sensitive to any movement! It detects a swaying tree across the drive whenever the wind blows! All in all it works pretty well! It lets us know when someone(something) comes up the driveway.

Reviews.Title: Worked 1 day...
Reviews.Author: Diana Cornelius
Reviews.Content: I should have known better...it worked fine for a few hours.  But the next day when I came home, it was going off like crazy and hasn't worked right since.  Don't buy this!

Reviews.Title: Constant Random Alerts
Reviews.Author: M. Pierce
Reviews.Content: I installed this driveway alert and it just keeps going off.  I tried changing the location of the sensor 3 times.  I'm not sure if it's reacting to  blowing leaves, birds or squirrels, but it is constantly chiming and giving me false alerts.  There is nothing in the manual about adjusting the sensitivity so I guess I just wasted my $$$.  This item is useless.

Reviews.Title: Extremely terrible product
Reviews.Author: PJ
Reviews.Content: Wish I could rate it a 0. Bought it, it didn't work. Returned it for a replacement.... shocker, it didn't work either.  Something inside of it wasn't secured so when you move it, it made this horrible noise reminiscent of a baby's rattle.  Complete piece of junk.  DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME!

Reviews.Title: Trademark 82-3731 Driveway Patrol Infrared Wireless Home Security Alarm.
Reviews.Author: ron
Reviews.Content: I gave this a 5 because I have a private driveway I need to know when someone is on it this dose the trick.no dislikes I can only say good about it.

Reviews.Title: great for the price.
Reviews.Author: neen
Reviews.Content: ghost alarms once in awhile.  Otherwise its a good deal for the money like the heads up that someone is coming up my driveway

Reviews.Title: Trademark detector review
Reviews.Author: Skip
Reviews.Content: I had a set of these sensor, albet they were the 200 ft range, for 5 years until they started eating batteries and becoming increasingly unreliable. I bought 3 of the Trademark 82-3731, and when received, one would not work and was sent back.  All three had different channels which was great. I mount one to detect traffic on my north drive and one on my south drive.  However, sometime the one on the south drive will start beeping for no reason at all and we have to turn it off for awhile.  When turned back on, it is ok.  When it is working, it works great, and with two different channels, we know if we have activity on the south or north drive. Don't know if the sensitivity is such that it detects falling leaves, moving branches or what, but sometime it gets very annoying.Skip W.

Reviews.Title: Perfect as a care-giver aid!
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I purchased this motion detector to use indoors. I provide care for a disabled person living in my home. She is very quiet when she gets up during the night, and this alerts me so that I am able to assist her. It works like a charm, has a great range, and I could not be happier with it.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: D. Behrens
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews about this product and frankly I didn't believe most of them.  I've had similar products like this and never had a problem.  My old one had just broke after 5 years of great service so I decided to try this one.  Big mistake!.  I placed it where I needed it and the only way it worked was if I stood in front of it and jumped up and down while holding the receiver.  I was very disappointed in it

Reviews.Title: TRADEMARK 82-3731 DRIVEWAY PATROL INFRARED WIRELESS ALARM SYSTEM
Reviews.Author: JIM
Reviews.Content: I'S GREAT MUCH BETTER THAN I THOUGHT SO GOOD I ORDERED TWO MORE ONE FOR MY NEIGHBOR AND ONE FOR INSIDE MY MAIL BOX SO I KNOW WHEN THE MAILMAN COMES.THEY ARE REALLY MADE WELL. THE ONLY BAD PART ITS MADE IN CHINA.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS AND I WILL ORDER MORE
Reviews.Author: John S. Mogavero
Reviews.Content: IM ON A CUL DE SAC AND I JUST LOVE THIS DRIVEWAY PATROL AND I DID HAVE TO GO TO RADIO SHACK FOR A POWER ADAPTER BUT FOR SECURITY IT IS AWSOME !!!!! IT HAS A HIGH AND LOW SWITCH FOR THE BEEPS AND I PUT IT ON HIGH AT NIGHT . FOR THE MONEY IT IS THE BEST AND I WILL ORDER MORE !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Not what I need.
Reviews.Author: Ginny
Reviews.Content: Didn't fill my need.  Went to Dakota Alert instead. ( And when I had a problem with the first unit, the company immediately fixed it.

Reviews.Title: To sensitive
Reviews.Author: J. E. Peek "JEP"
Reviews.Content: The instructions clearly say the the sensor works 30 feet.  I put the sensor on the front of the house which is 77 feet from the road and about every forth car that passes by sets it off.

Reviews.Title: Nice cheap fix.
Reviews.Author: A. Gagas
Reviews.Content: I have an office door that is not in the line of sight of any workers, but needs to remain unlocked during business hours. Remote entry buzzer systems were going to cost several thousand dollars to install.I experimented with this instead. Works very well, consistently, reliably. It freaks out when the battery gets low in the sensor, but that's better than not knowing its gone offline. The beam seems reasonably broad, so in an indoor confined area like a hallway, there's no getting past this thing.

Reviews.Title: This is the one you want.
Reviews.Author: B. Hall
Reviews.Content: I bought this set as a replacement for two failed TELEBRAND Driveway Patrol Sensor and Receiver Kits that lasted about 8 months. I have had this Trademark 82-3731 up and running trouble free for about two years. Batteries also last longer in this set. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because of range limitations in the real world of about 200 feet or less with obstructions, however that's true of any RF Tx/Rx set.

Reviews.Title: Great !
Reviews.Author: Thrifty Dan
Reviews.Content: Just what I needed. Got two of them and they work great. Would recommend to all my friends. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Observer
Reviews.Content: I tried and tried but could not make it work. I have another similar sensor from a different company that works fine.

Reviews.Title: driveway patrol infrared wireless
Reviews.Author: allmary
Reviews.Content: Bought this item at AmazonNot satisfied with this product - does not work all the time.
